title: Radiant Wukong Icon code transfer help
body: Anyone who has tried it, did Riot support let you use the Radiant wukong icon's EUW code on NA or vice-versa?

replies.body: The icon for the merch item is specific to the region it was purchased from.  We might be able to help though!  Just reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our merch team will see what can be done for you.  :D

I made this discussion because I saw that message of yours under another one. You didn't really answer if help is provided or not, so I assume there are some restrictions/demands. This discussion didn't generate any answers so I already reached out to the Support Team. Thanks, still!
Hey, sorry for the confusion.  It's very likely that we'll be able to help, but I can't make any guarantees.  We review each case individually, and do the best to help as we can.
